FuncDef: This command displays IPsec gateway information.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the service ID of the default security service used by the IPsec gateway. Values-1 to 214748364
svc-name: Up to 64 characters maximum.
Displays the IP address and UDP port of the SAP IPsec gateway to the tunnel. Values-0 to 65535.
Specifies the state of the tunnel. Values-up, down.
Displays a string as an IDi prefix. With this parameter, the system lists all the peers with IDi that has specified prefixes.
Displays the number of IPsec gateway tunnels with the ike-policy>authmethod command set to psk.
